articles.content: Fittler dug the boot in when he declared last week that someone got it wrong when the gun fullback was let go to join the Storm and said Papehuyzen was a standout player all through his development.… [+1451 chars]

articles.title: Mat Ryan dropped from Brighton line-up for 'tactical' reasons - FTBL Australia
articles.description: Mat Ryan missed a Premier League game for the first time in almost two years after he was relegated to the bench for Brighton and Hove Albion’s clash with Tottenham on Sunday.
articles.content:
The 28-year-old was left out of the side, along with top scorer Neil Maupay, for what manager Graham Potter described as tactical decisions in his post-match press conference.

articles.title: Ronaldo nets brilliant brace in Juventus return - The World Game
articles.description: Juventus were again heading for a 1-1 draw until Cristiano Ronaldo arrived from the bench, clear of coronavirus and in top form.
articles.content: Andrea Pirlo's men had been held by both Crotone and Hellas Verona in the absence of the five-time Ballon d'Or winner before he finally tested negative on Friday and was cleared to make his comeback.… [+2936 chars]
